      • isLoadPresetExperiment

        public boolean isLoadPresetExperiment()
        If true: read the preset cross-validation experiment from the data. Ignore the locations of data files (getFileNames()) for new experiment creation.
        if false: create a new cross-validation experiment using getFileNames() as data source
        Returns:
        whether to load a preset experiment

      • readProperties

        public void readProperties(java.lang.String PropertiesFile)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads all data settings from properties file
        Parameters:
        PropertiesFile - Path to the properties file to read from
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - loading properties failed, e.g. properties file not found or error reading a property (missing or wrong type)
